mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OPT_VIDEO_CLIP ORDER BY VIDEO_NO_SEQ DESC

SELECT R, OPT_ID, OPT_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_URL, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_CONTENT, VIDEO_REGDATE, VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM(SELECT ROWNUM R, OPT_ID, OPT_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_URL, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_CONTENT, VIDEO_REGDATE, VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM(SELECT M.OPT_ID, V.OPT_NO_SEQ, V.VIDEO_NO_SEQ, V.VIDEO_URL, V.VIDEO_TITLE, V.VIDEO_CONTENT, V.VIDEO_REGDATE, V.VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM OPT_VIDEO_CLIP V, OPT_MEMBER M WHERE V.OPT_NO_SEQ = M.OPT_NO_SEQ ORDER BY VIDEO_NO_SEQ DESC)) WHERE R BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM OPT_VIDEO_CLIP WHERE OPT_NO_SEQ = #{no} ORDER BY VIDEO_NO_SEQ DESC

SELECT R, OPT_ID, OPT_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_URL, VIDEO_TITLE,VIDEO_CONTENT, VIDEO_REGDATE, VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM(SELECT ROWNUM R,OPT_ID, OPT_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_URL, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_CONTENT, VIDEO_REGDATE, VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM(SELECT M.OPT_ID, V.OPT_NO_SEQ, V.VIDEO_NO_SEQ, V.VIDEO_URL, V.VIDEO_TITLE, V.VIDEO_CONTENT, V.VIDEO_REGDATE, V.VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM OPT_VIDEO_CLIP V, OPT_MEMBER M WHERE V.OPT_NO_SEQ = M.OPT_NO_SEQ ORDER BY VIDEO_NO_SEQ DESC)) WHERE R BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND OPT_NO_SEQ = #{no}

SELECT OPT_ID, OPT_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_URL, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_CONTENT, VIDEO_REGDATE, VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM(SELECT M.OPT_ID, V.OPT_NO_SEQ, V.VIDEO_NO_SEQ, V.VIDEO_URL, V.VIDEO_TITLE, V.VIDEO_CONTENT, V.VIDEO_REGDATE, V.VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM OPT_VIDEO_CLIP V, OPT_MEMBER M
V.OPT_NO_SEQ = M.OPT_NO_SEQ
AND OPT_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchtext}||'%'
AND VIDEO_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchtext}||'%'
AND VIDEO_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchtext}||'%'
ORDER BY VIDEO_NO_SEQ DESC)

SELECT R, OPT_ID, OPT_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_URL, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_CONTENT, VIDEO_REGDATE, VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM(SELECT ROWNUM R, OPT_ID, OPT_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_URL, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_CONTENT, VIDEO_REGDATE, VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM(SELECT M.OPT_ID, V.OPT_NO_SEQ, V.VIDEO_NO_SEQ, V.VIDEO_URL, V.VIDEO_TITLE, V.VIDEO_CONTENT, V.VIDEO_REGDATE, V.VIDEO_VIEWS_NO FROM OPT_VIDEO_CLIP V, OPT_MEMBER M
V.OPT_NO_SEQ = M.OPT_NO_SEQ
AND OPT_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchtext}||'%'
AND VIDEO_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchtext}||'%'
AND VIDEO_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchtext}||'%'
ORDER BY VIDEO_NO_SEQ DESC)) WHERE R BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE OPT_VIDEO_CLIP SET VIDEO_VIEWS_NO = VIDEO_VIEWS_NO +1 WHERE VIDEO_NO_SEQ = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OPT_VIDEO_CLIP A, OPT_MEMBER B WHERE A.VIDEO_NO_SEQ = #{video_no_seq} AND A.OPT_NO_SEQ = B.OPT_NO_SEQ

SELECT * FROM OPT_VIDEO_CLIP
ORDER BY OPT_NO_SEQ
WHERE VIDEO_NO_SEQ=#{searchtext}
WHERE OPT_NO_SEQ LIKE '%' || #{searchtext} || '%'
WHERE VIDEO_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchtext} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPT_VIDEO_CLIP VALUES( #{opt_no_seq}, VIDEOCLIPSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{video_url}, #{video_title}, #{video_content}, SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE OPT_VIDEO_CLIP SET VIDEO_URL = #{video_url}, VIDEO_TITLE = #{video_title}, VIDEO_CONTENT = #{video_content} WHERE VIDEO_NO_SEQ = #{video_no_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT OPT_ID, OPT_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_COMMENT_SEQ, VIDEO_REPLE, VIDEO_COMMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT M.OPT_ID, VC.OPT_NO_SEQ, VC.VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VC.VIDEO_COMMENT_SEQ, VC.VIDEO_REPLE, VC.VIDEO_COMMENT_DATE FROM OPT_VIDEO_COMMENT VC, OPT_MEMBER M WHERE VC.OPT_NO_SEQ = M.OPT_NO_SEQ AND VIDEO_NO_SEQ = #{no} ORDER BY VIDEO_COMMENT_SEQ DESC)

SELECT OPT_ID, OPT_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VIDEO_COMMENT_SEQ, VIDEO_REPLE, VIDEO_COMMENT_DATE FROM (SELECT M.OPT_ID, VC.OPT_NO_SEQ, VC.VIDEO_NO_SEQ, VC.VIDEO_COMMENT_SEQ, VC.VIDEO_REPLE, VC.VIDEO_COMMENT_DATE FROM OPT_VIDEO_COMMENT VC, OPT_MEMBER M WHERE VC.OPT_NO_SEQ = M.OPT_NO_SEQ AND VIDEO_COMMENT_SEQ = #{video_comment_seq} ORDER BY VIDEO_COMMENT_SEQ DESC)
